title: Hanh trinh lua chon cua ban
overview: Ban la mot sinh vien nam nhat. Moi quyet dinh trong hoc tap, cong viec va dong gop xa hoi se tac dong den huong di tuong lai.

intro.title: Tong the cot truyen
summary: Game gom 4 phan theo 4 linh vuc: kinh te, chinh tri, tu tuong - van hoa, xa hoi.
Moi phan co 3 lua chon. Lua chon cua ban se cong diem nhiet huyet va mo ra ket qua cuoi cung.
Ban co the choi lai de thu cac chien luoc khac nhau.

steps.title: Phan 1 - Kinh te
steps.context: Ban co 6 thang de chuan bi cho nam hoc moi. Ban se uu tien gi?
steps.quote: Tri thuc tre phai tao ra gia tri that tu nang luc that.

choices.label: Nghien cuu cong nghe
choices.description: Hoc them du lieu, AI va ky nang ky thuat ung dung.

choices.label: Khoi nghiep nho
choices.description: Thu nghiem mo hinh kinh doanh giai quyet van de dia phuong.

choices.label: Lam viec ngan han
choices.description: Chi chon viec de co thu nhap nhanh ma khong dau tu ky nang.

steps.title: Phan 2 - Chinh tri
steps.context: Lop ban co tranh luan gay gat ve mot chinh sach moi tren mang xa hoi.
steps.quote: Ban linh cong dan duoc the hien qua cach tiep can su that.

choices.label: Kiem chung truoc khi chia se
choices.description: Doc nguon chinh thong va tom tat thong tin dung de thao luan.

choices.label: To chuc doi thoai trong lop
choices.description: Moi giang vien ho tro va thuc hanh tranh bien co can cu.

choices.label: Chia se theo cam tinh
choices.description: Dang lai thong tin chua xac minh vi thay hop quan diem.

steps.title: Phan 3 - Tu tuong van hoa
steps.context: Cau lac bo truyen thong can mot chien dich moi cho gioi tre.
steps.quote: Ban sac van hoa khong dung yen, no can duoc sang tao va lan toa.

choices.label: Lam du an noi dung lich su
choices.description: Dung video ngan de ke chuyen lich su theo ngon ngu hien dai.

choices.label: To chuc ngay hoi van hoa
choices.description: Ket hop am nhac, my thuat va thu vien so cho hoc sinh.

choices.label: Chay theo xu huong de viral
choices.description: Tap trung view ngan han, bo qua gia tri giao duc.

steps.title: Phan 4 - Xa hoi
steps.context: Dia phuong can doi thanh nien van hanh mot chuong trinh ho tro hoc sinh vung xa.
steps.quote: Cong hien xa hoi la noi dao duc va nang luc gap nhau.

choices.label: Xay du an 6 thang
choices.description: Lap ke hoach day ky nang so, do luong ket qua theo tung thang.

choices.label: Ket noi truong va doanh nghiep
choices.description: Goi hoc bong va tai tro thiet bi cho chuong trinh hoc tap.

choices.label: Tham gia 1 ngay cho co
choices.description: Co mat theo phong trao nhung khong duy tri dong gop.

resultBands.title: Nha tien phong tri thuc
resultBands.text: Ban tro thanh tri thuc tre co tam nhin dai han va tao duoc tac dong xa hoi ro rang.

resultBands.title: Nguoi lao dong co ich
resultBands.text: Ban co nen tang tot va dang tren duong tro thanh nhan to then chot cua tap the.

resultBands.title: Can bo sung dinh huong
resultBands.text: Ban da co mot so lua chon dung, nhung can kien tri hon de tao ket qua ben vung.

resultBands.title: Can tai khoi dong
resultBands.text: Ban dang de mat co hoi phat trien. Hay choi lai va uu tien cac lua chon co trach nhiem hon.
